name: Automatic Overhead Transparency
author: grayswandir
info: Turns overhead combos transparent when Link walks underneath them.
description: In the script itself, you can toggle layers 3 through 6 to be affected. Whenever Link is under a non-zero combo in any of the chosen layers, all of the selected layers are turned transparent or invisible.
setup: Instructions are in the script itself.To run, just place Overhead_Update() in your active loop.You can also edit the configuration section to choose which layers are affected, and to choose transparency or complete invisibility.
